pages.text: Nyxium is a new metal added by Terramity.$(br2)Nyxium can be obtained by crafting together profanum, antiprism, and opaline moonstone.$(br2)Nyxium can only be obtained after defeating the Shadow Wizards.

pages.title: Nyxium
pages.text: Nyxium holds the power of the moon.
This metal has no smithing template, instead, you must make the toolset and armor with just the ingots alone.
